entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:56 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 06:56 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
